title: Readout of President Biden’s Call with President Macron of France | The White House
content: President Joseph R. Biden, Jr. spoke today with President Emmanuel Macron of France to congratulate him on his re-election.  He underscored the close and enduring relations between the United States and France, our oldest ally, based on shared democratic values, economic ties, and security cooperation. President Biden conveyed his readiness to continue working closely with President Macron on our shared global priorities. ###
